Posts.Content: Feb 1, 2008 11:51PM elaine1 wrote: Hi, I am also going to a prominent Detroit Area Cancer Center and my onc is, how shall I put it, oh, i know,  like an absent-minded professor.  He has a very good reputation and I know he's smart, but often my DH and I have to give him a copy of my latest CT as he hadn't seen it.  I go to U of M and have my second opinions from an onc there. Let me know if I can help you in any way.  Wishing you and everyone out there well.  Elaine
